description:
In this course you will finally get the secrets to write your Kindle book fast. How fast? 7 days, yes your book can be finished by next week.

This course is for you if you are a new authors who has always wanted to finish writing your first book. The course is created in a simple, but clear and effective manner that when followed will lead to Kindle book publishing success.


You will learn the tools and techniques:

  • How to write your Kindle Book much faster.
  • Finding the Best Money Making Topics.
  • Remove your writing distractions.
  • How to stay focused on Writing Your Book.
  • How to use dictation to write 5000 words per hour.
  • How to Set and Achieve Your Kindle Book Goals.
  • Cover Design For Only $5.
  • Get the Concepts, Tools and Systems You Will Need to Get Your Book Out.
  • Learn This Powerful Book Writing Skill & Use Over and Over Again.
title: How to Create & Publish Your Kindle Book in Under a Week.
